name: Gerstenberg Heroes
description:
Prush Civil War! You are a small regiment, left behind to clean up in the imperial war against the treasonous technocratic confederates!

It's a twin stick shooter for up to four players with gamepads.

Originally created for the 2016 NHTI Fall Game Jam, see jam page for more details and original build.

Multiplayer Note

You must plug in all gamepads before you start playing. There will be as many players as there are gamepads.

Controls ButtonsActionLeft Stick / D-Pad / ArrowsMoveRight Stick / Face buttons / WASDShoot
